cpcivm_add_step1_title: Select an OS or a snapshot

cpcivm_add_step1_images_ERROR: Unable to recover the list of images of the operating system: {{message}}
cpcivm_add_step1_shapshots_ERROR: Unable to recover the list of snapshots: {{message}}
cpcivm_add_step1_windows_message: The costs of the Windows licences will be added to the price of the selected instance automatically.
cpcivm_add_step1_sshKey_adding_ERROR: Unable to add the new key: {{message}}
cpcivm_add_step1_sshKey_message:
You need SSH keys in order to connect to your service.
Find out more about SSH keys.
cpcivm_add_step1_sshKey_licence: To use the images, you will need to accept the supplier's user licence agreement.
cpcivm_add_step1_sshKey_regions_message: Your SSH key will be available for all regions and OVH datacentres.
cpcivm_add_step2_title: Select a region and a datacentre
cpcivm_add_step2_regions_ERROR: Unable to recover list of available regions and datacentres available: {{message}}
cpcivm_add_step2_quota_ERROR: Unable to load your available quota: {{message}}
cpcivm_add_step3_category_definition_bal: Instances for general use offer a good balance of RAM and performance.
cpcivm_add_step3_category_definition_cpu: Instances with optimised computing are ideally suited to applications that require high processing speeds or parallel task processing.
cpcivm_add_step3_category_definition_ram: Instances with optimised memory are recommended for your databases, analyses and in-memory computing, as well as other RAM-intensive applications.
cpcivm_add_step3_category_definition_acc: Instances with accelerated computing (GPU, FPGA) are up to 1,000 times faster than a CPU for certain applications (rendering, video transcoding, bioinformatics, big data, deep learning, etc.)
cpcivm_add_step3_category_definition_vps: Instances with shared resources (Sandbox) are suitable for testing, verifications and development environments. Their performance may vary slightly over time.
cpcivm_add_step3_disabled_message_NOT_AV: Region(s) in which this instance is available: {{regions}}
cpcivm_add_step3_disabled_message_QUOTA_: Your current quota of RAM is {{quota.remaining}} for the region you have selected. The instance selected requires {{quota.required}}.
Your current quota is {{quota.remaining}} core(s) for the region selected. The instance selected requires {{quota.required}} core(s).
The image {{name}} requires a minimum of {{requiredDisk}} of disk space in order to install. The instance selected has only {{currentDisk}}.
The {{name}} image requires a minimum of {{requiredRam}} of RAM in order to function properly. The instance selected has only {{currentRam}}.
cpcivm_add_step3_quantity_label: Number of instances to be created
cpcivm_add_step3_quantity_info: All your instances will be configured the same way, and implemented in the same region.
cpcivm_add_step3_quantity_help: Under your current quota, you can create up to a maximum of {{max}} simultaneous {{type}} instance(s) for the {{region}} region.
cpcivm_add_step3_name_help: May contain numbers, letters, underscores, dashes and full stops only.
cpcivm_add_step3_name_additional: The names of additional instances will be prefixed and incremented based on the term entered.
cpcivm_add_step3_network_info: Use a private network to protect your data. This will not only boost the connection between your services; it will also allow you to exchange data securely between servers.More info on private networks.
cpcivm_add_step3_flavor_prices_ERROR: Unable to retrieve the prices for the products available: {{message}}
cpcivm_add_step3_flavors_ERROR: Unable to retrieve the list of products available: {{message}}
cpcivm_add_step5_message: The monthly instalments will be charged as soon as the instance is started up, and allow you to save 50% on server costs. For use during short periods only, we recommend choosing hourly billing, then switching to monthly billing later if required.
cpcivm_add_launch_ERROR: An error has occurred creating your new instance: {{message}}
